pages.title: Straw
pages.text: Straw is crafted from the straw bunch block.Can be used as a fuel, as well as in crafting recipes.You can turn straw into gold using spinning wheel, if you were lucky enough to get a wither fork bone.

pages.title: Straw Bunch
pages.text: Bunch of dried grass.Can be used to craft straw or for decorative purposes.

pages.title: Grass Bunch
pages.text: Bunch of raw grass.Grab some high grass and craft a bunch of grass, then leave it for a while under the sun to dry up - and you will get a straw bunch block.
